resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158260</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158260</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1009</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reporting on Community Service/ Volunteer work</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bericht über Ableistung- von 
Sozialstundenfreiwilligerarbeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rendre compte du travail de volontaire de service 
de la Communauté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relatório no trabalho do voluntário do serviço 
de comunidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnalando sul lavoro del volontario di servizio 
della Comunità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποβολή έκθεσης σχετικά με την κοινοτική υπηρεσία/την
εθελοντική εργασία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El señalar sobre trabajo del voluntario del 
servicio de comunidad</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Reporting on Community Service/ Volunteer work
Oral Presentation, supported by PowerPoint Presentation of pupils' volunteer/ community work followed by Formal Written Report and Reflection.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Community Service</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Volunteer work</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bericht über die Ableistung- von 
Sozialstundenfreiwilliger-workOral Darstellung, unterstützt von 
PowerPoint Presentation der freiwilligen Arbeit Gemeinschaft der 
Pupillen gefolgt Formal Written vom Report und von der Reflexion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rendant compte de la présentation workOral de 
volontaire de service de la Communauté, supportée par PowerPoint 
Presentation du travail volontaire de la communauté des pupilles 
suivi d'état et de réflexion de Formal Written.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relatando na apresentação workOral do 
voluntário do serviço de comunidade, suportada por PowerPoint 
Apresentação do trabalho voluntário da comunidade das pupilas 
seguido pelo relatório e pela reflexão de Formal Escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnalando sulla presentazione workOral del 
volontario di servizio della Comunità, sostenuta da PowerPoint 
Presentation del lavoro volontario della Comunità delle pupille è 
seguito dal rapporto e dalla riflessione del Formal Written.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υποβάλλοντας έκθεση σχετικά με την κοινοτική 
υπηρεσία/την εθελοντική παρουσίαση workOral, που υποστηρίζεται 
από PowerPoint παρουσίαση της εθελοντικής/κοινοτικής εργασίας 
των μαθητών που παρακολουθείται από την επίσημες γραπτές έκθεση 
και την αντανάκλαση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señalando sobre la presentación workOral del 
voluntario del servicio de comunidad, utilizada por PowerPoint 
Presentation del trabajo voluntario de la comunidad de las pupilas 
seguido por el informe y la reflexión Formal Written.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ableistung von Sozialstunden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freiwillige Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Service de la Communauté</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail volontaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Serviço De Comunidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho voluntário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Servizio Della Comunità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro volontario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινοτική υπηρεσία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθελοντική εργασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Servicio De Comunidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo voluntario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <contribute>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

        <rights>

        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
